This luxurious gel moisturizer with a powdery matte finish quickly absorbs into the skin to help promote a clear complexion and refined texture, leaving the skin looking fresh, smooth, and radiant.
all_ingreds:
Pink Pepper Leaf Extract - a unique extract rich in polyphenols that helps reduce oil at the skin’s surface, minimize the appearance of pores, and refine skin texture.
                          Rosa Centifolia Flower Extract - An extract derived from French roses that delivers immediate and long-term hydration while helping support the skin’s natural barrier function. Its unique prebiotic and probiotic effects help maintain a balanced skin microbiome for reduced oxidative stress. Its postbiotic effects aid in skin recovery.
                          Hydrolyzed Rice Extract - a powerful extract that helps deliver immediate and long-term hydration when used twice daily. It has been shown to boost moisturization in the deep and superficial layers of the skin and improve overall barrier function with continued use.
                          Full ingredient list: Water, Dimethicone, Glycerin, C12-15 Alkyl Lactate, Sodium Polyacrylate, Butylene Glycol, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Phenoxyethanol, Propanediol, Sodium PCA , Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Decylene Glycol, Erythritol, Trideceth-6, Carrageenan, 1,2-Hexanediol, Xanthan Gum, Hydrolyzed Rice Bran Extract, Rosa Centifolia Flower Extract, Schinus Molle Extract.

                          	Squalane: A humectant derived from plant sugar works to seal in moisture and keep skin hydrated while helping to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Clinically shown to reduce appearance of wrinkles by 51% at 28 days.

                          	Peptides: Amino acids that help boost collagen to plump skin and smooth fine lines and wrinkles.

                          	Pomegranate Enzyme: Provides gentle exfoliation helping to brighten skin and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
                          	Ceramide NP: Replenishes and restores skin's barrier to maintain moisture balance, improve visible signs of aging, and protect against environmental damage.
                          	Sodium Hyaluronate: A water-soluble salt derived from hyaluronic acid that retains moisture while replenishing and plumping skin to improve fine lines and wrinkles.
                          	Sodium PCA: An effective humectant that helps plump and restores skin and reduce inflammation while helping to prevent signs of aging.
                          	Malic Acid & Lactic Acid: Gentle AHAs that exfoliate and promote youthful skin without irritation.
